I am ready to take on the role of a gang leader. 

You want to know how I keep these punks in line? It ain't rocket science.  Fear. Respect. That's what it boils down to.  You gotta make sure they know who's boss, who calls the shots. One wrong move, one sign of weakness, and they'll be begging for mercy.

I ain't afraid to get my hands dirty.  A little beatdown here, a broken bone there, it sends a message loud and clear.  They see what happens to those who cross me, and they fall in line. And those who think they're tough? I break 'em. Show 'em what real power is.

Respect ain't given, it's earned. And I earn it every damn day.  I provide, I protect, I make sure they got what they need.  But they gotta remember who's in charge. They gotta know I'm the one holding the reins. 

Anyone else thinks they can step up? They'll learn their lesson.  I'll make sure of it.
